long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension helps you to place the user in the search input of the web page you are on, or in the text type input that the user wants.
Pressing Ctrl + Shift +? and clicking on the input saves an identifier of the input in a cookie.
Now with the same shortcut the input will be focused automatically to be able to write in it without using the mouse.
Pressing Ctrl + Shift +! the cookie is deleted.
